dmca.title: iLounge complains of article re-blog
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concert: 

Your company (Blogger.com) hosts a web site (Online Downloads http://online-downloads.blogspot.com) that is currently in direct violation of the copyrights of my publishing company and web site. iLounge.com. We are therefore providing notice to you constituting "actual knowledge" of your user's copyright infringement for purposes of enforcing our rights as necessary under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, as found at 17 U.S.C. a 512(c) et seq. We are further requesting that you immediately disable access to the web site and inform the owner that he is subjecting himself, his site, and your company to liability for infringement. 

As required by the D.M.C.A., I am providing the following: 

(ii) Identification on of the works infringed: 
http://online-downloads.blogspot.com/2007/02/all-things-iphone.html 

(iii) identification of the Infringing materials: 

http://www.ilounge.com/index.php/articles/comments/all-things-iphone/ 

(iv) My contact information: 
[private], Publisher and Owner, iLounge.com 
E-mail: [private]@iLounge.com
Address: [private], Irvine, CA 92602 
Telephone: [private]

(v) Statement of belief 

I am the owner of the content in question and possess full and exclusive rights to control its use, display, and republication. No site, including but not limited to online-downloads.blogspot.com, does not have permission to repost our content 

(vi) Affirmation of accuracy
The information in this norification is accurate, and I agree that under penalty of perjury, that I am authorized to act as the owner of an exclusive right that has bean infringed. 

(I) My signature as the owner of the exclusive rights in the infringed work: 

[private], Publisher and Owner, iLounge
Publisher, iLounge
[private]@iLounge.com
http://www.iLounge.com
